Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-1TSa (XXA; natural AMPs; UCLL1c; frog, amphibians, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Much less active than 2TSa (AP587). active against S. epidermidis RP62A (MIC 12.5 uM), E. coli ATCC25922 (MIC 25 uM), S. aureus NCTC 8325 or MRSA T7/20 (MIC 25 uM), E. cloacae HNTCC 5300 (MIC 50 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC 50 uM), E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC 50 uM), Streptococcus group B HNTCC 80130 (MIC 50 uM), C. albicans ATCC 90028  (MIC 50 uM).Toxicity: highly hemolytic HC50 12 uM. Updated 5/2020; 4/2024.
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM, et al., Iwamuro S.2006
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from the skin of the Tsushima brown frog Rana tsushimensis
